amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to open or operate a new diplomatic or consular post in Vietnam, to expand any U.S. diplomatic or consular post in Vietnam, or to increase the number of personnel assigned to the diplomatic post in Vietnam above the level existing on July 11, 1995.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of July 21, as amendment No. 2 (by Mr. Barr), to prohibit the use of funds to open or operate a new diplomatic or consular post in Vietnam, to expand any U.S. diplomatic or consular post in Vietnam, or to increase the number of personnel assigned to the diplomatic post in Vietnam.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
